description: The National Specialized Centre for Organic Agriculture, established in 1997, focuses on promoting organic farming in Costa Rica. It offers free training programs, emphasizing ecological practices and the transfer of appropriate technologies to various agricultural sectors. The center supports students, including vulnerable populations, through scholarships and comprehensive welfare services. With a commitment to reducing chemical use in agriculture, it aims to enhance food systems and foster sustainable practices across the country.
name: INA Agricultura Organica
